quiz_item.error_analysis: 将前缀“homeo-”误联想为“home（家）”，结合“stasis”猜测为“家庭相关的稳定状态”，忽略“homeo-”表示“相同”的正确词根含义
quiz_item.sentence: The human body maintains **homeostasis** by regulating temperature, pH, and blood sugar levels to keep its internal conditions stable.

option.definition: （生物体内的）内环境稳定；动态平衡
完全静止或停滞的状态
